subject: Harness Racing
lead_paragraph: One More Laugh, driven by Tim Tetrick, captured the $1 million Meadowlands Pace in a photo finish over the favored Rock N Roll Heaven in East Rutherford, N.J.
snippet: One More Laugh, driven by Tim Tetrick, captured the $1 million Meadowlands Pace in a photo finish over the favored Rock N Roll Heaven in East Rutherford, N.J.
